title: The Max Level Hero has Returned! - Novel Updates
tags: Accelerated Growth   Adapted to Manhwa   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Comedic Undertone   Demon Lord   Depictions of Cruelty   Family Conflict   God-human Relationship   Goddesses   Godly Powers   Gods   Golems   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heroes   Kingdom Building   Maids   Male Protagonist   Money Grubber   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Romantic Subplot   Royalty   Sentient Objects   Sibling Rivalry   Siblings   Spirit Advisor   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Twins   Vampires   Younger Brothers   Younger Sisters
author: Devil Tail   악마꼬리
description:
The weak prince of an insignificant country, Davey. After becoming comatose, his soul escaped to a temple where the souls of heroes gathered. 

He trained for a thousand years and has now returned as a max level hero! 

“Just you guys wait, I’m gonna face you all head-on!” 

The refreshing story of Davey’s royal life and revenge has just begun.>
